name: LOADED TATER TOTS
description: Crispy tater tots topped with melted cheddar cheese, bacon bits, sour cream & green onions.

name: HOUSE MADE SOUP OF THE DAY
description: Daily selection of fresh soups

name: CHICKEN CAESAR SALAD
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in caesar dressing with grilled chicken, croutons & parmesan cheese.

name: FALL HARVEST SALAD
description: Mixed greens tossed in cranberry vinaigrette with grilled chicken, sliced pears, goat cheese & candied pecans.

name: SPICY BLACK BEAN BURGER
description: House made black bean burger on a toasted bun with mixed greens, tomato & red onion. Served with a side of southwest ranch.

name: GRILLED CHEESE & SOUP
description: Gooey grilled cheese sandwich made with cheddar cheese & served with a cup of our house made soup of the day.

name: CHICKEN BACON RANCH WRAP
description: Grilled chicken, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato & ranch dressing in a warm wrap.

name: COLD SANDWICH
description: Choice of roasted turkey, roast beef, ham, chicken salad, or corned beef, comes with cheese. Add-ons: with lettuce, tomato, & onion | Small $7 Large $10 / with cheese | Small $6 Large $8
price: 6" Sub or Bread $8 | 12" Sub or Wrap $13

name: Fall and Winter Menu
Cold Sandwich
description: Choice of roasted turkey, roast beef, ham, chicken salad, or corned beef, comes with cheese. Add-ons: with cheese | Small $6 Large $8 / with lettuce, tomato, & onion | Small $7 Large $10
price: 6" Sub or Bread $8 | 12" Sub or Wrap $13

name: French 75
description: Tanqueray gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, topped with La Marca prosecco

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
description: Gosling's Black Seal rum & ginger beer, served with a lime wedge

name: Manhattan
description: Bulleit Rye whiskey, Martini & Rossi sweet vermouth, Angostura bitters, served with a Luxardo cherry

name: Paloma
description: Casamigos Blanco tequila, grapefruit soda, lime juice

name: Espresso Martini
description: Absolut vodka, Kahlua, fresh espresso

name: Aperol Spritz
description: Aperol, La Marca prosecco, soda water, served with an orange slice

name: WİNTER OF OUR DİSCONTENT
description: TOMMYROTTER BOURBON, APEROL, AMARO NONINO, LEMON

name: FERNET ABOUT IT
description: SAZERAC RYE, FERNET BRANCA, GİNGER ALE, SPICED CHERRY BİTTERS

name: LA VIE EN BLANCHE
description: GREY GOOSE, WHİTE CRANBERRY, FRESH LIME, ORANGE LIQUEUR, ST. GERMAİN

name: THIS IS JUST TO SAY...
description: GREY GOOSE, UME PLUM LIQUEUR, LEMON, ORANGE LIQUEUR, CHERRY

name: THYME WAITS FOR SNOWMAN
description: BARR HİLL GİN, LEMON WASH, THYME LİQUEUR, HONEY

name: STOPPING BY WOODS
description: PİNHOOK BOURBON, NOCINO WALNUT LIQUEUR, SWEET VERMOUTH, SPICED CRANBERRY BİTTERS

name: WİNTER AND SMOKE
description: KNOB CREEK SMOKED MAPLE BOURBON, ANGOSTURA BİTTERS, AMARENA CHERRY, ORANGE

name: THE WINTER PEAR
description: 818 REPOSADO, FRESH LIME, SPICED PEAR LİQUEUR, PEAR NECTAR

name: SPRITZ AND SPARKLE
description:
HEMINGWAY: THE ORİGİNAL BELLİNİ
PEACH MELBA: PROSCCO, WHITE PEACH NECTAR, FRAMBOISE
TAVERNA TONİC: CAMPARİ, GRAPEFRUIT, BLOOD ORANGE LİQUEUR, PROSECCO
ORİGİNAL SPRİTZ: APEROL, PROSECCO, CLUB, ORANGE

name: TIRAMISU ME
description: VANILLA VODKA, ESPRESSO LİQUEUR, TİRAMİSU LİQUEUR, MELETTİ CHOCOLATE, FRESHLY BREWED ESPRESSO

name: SHOT IN THE DARK
description: TITO'S, ESPRESSO LIQUEUR, FRESHLY BREWED ESPRESSO

name: CRÈME BRULÉE
description: VANILLA VODKA, CRÈME BRULÉE LİQUEUR, FRESHLY BREWED ESPRESSO

name: BUZZKİLL
description: FRESHLY BREWED ESPRESSO, N/A COFFEE LIQUEUR, CREAM

name: WHISKEY A NO-GO
description: RITUAL ZERO PROOF WHISKEY, ANGOSTURA ORANGE BİTTERS, ORANGE, SİMPLE SYRUP

name: WHAT DOESN'T TEQUILA YOU
description: RITUAL ZERO PROOF TEQUILA, FRESH LIME, FEVER TREE SPARKLING BLOOD ORANGE

name: RESOLUTION SOLUTION
description: N/A SPARKLING WHİTE TEA, PEAR NECTAR, CRANBERRY

name: FAUXGRONİ
description: ST. AGRESTIS ORIGINAL PHONY WHITE NEGRONI

name: SKINNY SPRITZ
description: AN N/A VERSION OF THE APEROL SPRITZ!

name: ZARDETTO, Prosecco Brut Private Cuvée, Veneto, NV (91JS)
ST. SUPERY, Sauvignon Blanc, California, Napa Valley, 2023 (93WE/91WS)
CAPOSALDO, Pinot Grigio, Italy, Veneto, 2023
GRAN PASSIONE, Red Blend, Italy, Veneto, 2022
PAOLO SARACCO, Moscato d'Asti, Italy, Piedmont, 2024
description: orange blossoms, ruby grapefruit, vanilla, hints of wild herbs..layers of fruit in harmony with juicy acidity and a hint of spice..this is the bottle i pour for my wine students! (94WE)

name: SELLA & MOSCA, Vermentino di Gallura, "MONTEORO", Italy, Sardinia, 2023
description: fresh as a daisy and crisp as an ocean breeze on a summer's day....notes of bright citrus, white pepper and a salinity that speaks of its homeland sardinia, surrounded by the sea...a benchmark for the category...you will find it a delicious starter sipper or to pair with lighter fare and seafood.

name: ABBAZIA DI NOVACELLA, Grüner Veltliner, Italy, Alto Adige, 2023
description: a rare gru-v from the alpine climes of northern italy...makes sense, really, as it is usually grown in austria and the alto adige region shares many climatic similarities...gruner veltliner finds itself very much at home with fall flavors...it is smooth and savory with typical notes of stone fruit, white pepper and nutmeg...it's GRU-V, baby...GRU-V. (93WA/90JS)

name: SONOMA-CUTRER, Chardonnay, Russian River Ranches, California, Sonoma, 2023
description: great balance between zesty and creamy...a ripe and buttery palate but with ample salinity and bright tropical and citrus fruits to hold everything in perfect harmony...a zingy beam of lemon curd on the finish. (91JS)

name: POSTMARK BY DUCKHORN, Cabernet Sauvignon, California, Paso Robles, 2022
description: paso robles cabs have legions of fans...this example is proof positive of the allure of paso...rich and generous with a palate full of boysenberry, plum and black raspberry jam...a touch of vanilla scented spice on the finish adds to the appeal of this voluptuous vamp. (93JS)

name: BLUE ROCK VINEYARDS, Baby Blue Red, California, Sonoma, 2021
description: i am often asked what we sip at home...you know, just on a let's grill some burgers kind of evening...this is often the answer to that question...primarily cabernet sauvignon but pays homage to bordeaux incorporating all 5 classic bordeaux varietals in the blend...it just checks all the boxes and we hope you love it as much as we do. (92WE/90JS)

name: ARGIANO, Rosso Toscana "Non Confunditur", Italy, Toscana, 2023
description: latin for unique and unmistakable, this "superbaby" offers delicious currant and red fruits; approachable, fresh and lively..sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon and merlot..absolutely fabulous..surprisingly hard to get your hands on and a stunning value. (92JS)

name: AZELIA, Langhe Nebbiolo, Italy, Piedmont, 2022
description: literally baby barolo, as the grapes come from azelia's barolo vineyards...this nebbiolo displays such purity and brightness on the nose and palate..wild roses, so typical of the varietal, are there in spades and the finish is luminous..zesty acidity and fully ripe tannins on display. (91DC)

name: CASTELLO DI VERRAZZANO, Chianti Classico, Italy, Tuscany, 2021
description: certified organic and sustainable..one of the founding members of the consorzio del chianti classico, castello di verrazzano has produced wine for centuries..rich in flavors of blackberry and amarena cherry..incredible balance and structure..this is an outstanding wine. (92VM/91WA)

name: LUCE DELLE VITE, "Lucente", Super Tuscan, Italy, Tuscany, 2021
description: this baby super tuscan has always been a favorite..bright cherry fruits with notes of smoke and dark red fruits..marvelous acidity makes this an exceptional food wine..nobody puts THIS baby in the corner. (94JS/9OWA)

name: CIPRIANI, Prosecco DOC, Brut, Italy, Veneto, NV
description: from THE birthplace of prosecco and the original bellini at harry's bar in venice comes this super sippable sparkler...fine effervescence and perlage...dry with hints of citrus zest and almond skin...quite sippable on its own and positively perfect with calamari fritti.

name: BISOL, Desiderio Relio Rive di Guia Brut Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore, Italy, Veneto, 2023
description: estate grown, single vineyard prosecco from on of the most famous producers of the wine...an elegant mousse..notes of crisp, granny smith apples and citrus..fresh, light and lively on the palate..a delightful sip with a lime zest tinged finish. (90WS)

name: FERRARI, Brut Rosé, Italy, Trentino-Alto Adige DOC, NV
description: salmon pink in the glass with aromas of wild strawberries, hints of almond skin and ginger spice...well balanced, fresh and FUN. (92JS/90WA/90WS/90WE)

name: CA' DEL BOSCO, Franciacorta, "Cuvée Prestige" Italy, Lombardia, NV
description: this is OMG good...crafted from certified organic pinot noir, chardonnay and pinot bianco grapes...an intense golden hue with a nose filled with ripe peach and vanilla laced fbiscuits...ca' del bosco is one of the foremost producers of franciacorta, italian for "champagne". (92WS)

name: LINI 910 Labrusca Rosso, Italy, Emilia-Romagna, N/V
description: emilia-romagna is the gastronomic capital of italy, where you will find some of the most iconic foods of italy..prosciutto di parma, to name one...as such, this slightly dry lambrusco finds itself most at home with cured meats and is a delightful pizza partner.

name: PLANETA, Rosé di Sicilia, Italy, Sicily, 2024
description: a delicate pink hue with aromas of hibiscus and rose petal..it is fresh and lively on the palate and has an unmistakable peachiness on the finish..crafted from sicily's signature nero d'avola and syrah, it pairs beautifully with slightly spicy calamari.

name: MIRABEAU, "PURE", France, Provence, 2024
description: when we find ourselves daydreaming of warm summer evenings and our toes in the sand, this is the wine that we sip...a pale peach hue with aromatics of white raspberry and cherry blossoms, finishing dry and delish. (92WE)

name: LA SPINETTA TOSCANA, II Rosé di Casanova, Italy, Tuscany, 2024
description: like a tuscan sunset, this perennial porch pounder is easy to adore..sangiovese based with notes of white cherries and blood orange notes..a streak of salinity keeps it fresh and fun.

name: SELLA & MOSCA, Vermentino di Gallura, "MONTEORO", Italy, Sardinia, 2022
description: Fresh as a daisy and crisp as an ocean breeze on a summer's day...notes of bright citrus, white pepper and a salinity that speaks of its homeland sardinia, surrounded by the sea...a benchmark for the category...you will find it a delicious starter sipper or to pair with lighter fare and seafood.

name: ABBAZIA DI NOVACELLA, Grüner Veltliner, Italy, Alto Adige, 2023
description: A rare gru-v from the alpine climes of northern italy...makes sense, really, as it is usually grown in austria and the alto adige region shares many climatic similarities...gruner veltliner finds itself very much at home with fall flavors...it is smooth and savory with typical notes of stone fruit, white pepper and nutmeg...it's GRU-V, baby...GRU-V. (93WA/90JS)

name: AVIGNONESI, Toscana Bianco "Da Di" IGT, Italy, Tuscany, 2023
description: An homage to a few of the indigenous white varietals from tuscany...orpicchio, grechetto, trebbiano and vermentino join forces in this delicious golden hued white with notes of white peach, granny smith apple and citrus...a marked freshness on the palate and the finish. (94JS)

name: PLANETA, Etna Bianco, Italy, Sicily, 2023
description: When you live this close to mt. etna, you NEED the perfect white to cool you off and here it is... dry and mineral-driven with notes of green apple, a touch of smoke and spice...it is the vinous example of how just a little drizzle of citrus can brighten up any dish (92WE)

name: ELENA WALCH, Castel Ringberg Pinot Grigio, Italy, Alto Adige, 2023
description: Most pinot grigios are for drinking, not thinking...this is a more serious version...a nose full of minerals, wet stones, grilled herbs and citrus zest...medium bodied with a long, mineral tinged close...outstanding. (94JS/91WS)

name: CANTINA DEL TABURNO, "ERA" Greco del Beneventano, Italy, Campania, 2022
description: Campania boasts some truly amazing examples of dry and minerally whites..this is one example...pure and focused with white peach, notes of lilacs in springtime and a bracing mineral quality that make it not only a refreshing quaff in its own right but also remarkable with seafood.

name: ALTURIS, Friuli Colli Orientali Friulano, Italy, Friuli, 2024
description: Friulano is one of my absolute favorite white grapes from italy...it is a grape that expresses its terroir in spades...notes of anjou pear and honey roasted almonds...it has a great minerality and pairs well with many of our food offerings.

name: ALOIS LAGEDER, Vigneti delle Dolomiti Pinot Bianco "Versalto", Italy, Alto Adige, 2022
description: Crisp aromas and flavors of ripe orchard fruits...crisp, minerally and refreshing, ending with a tingly acidity and a clean, light body...delish (92WA/91JS)

name: VIETTI, Roero Arneis, Italy, Piedmont, 2024
description: One of my pets, arneis translates to "little rascal" in piemontese dialect..pale, straw yellow with notes of freshly cut flowers, lemon zest and hand melon...unoaked, dry and pretty as a picture..an excellent aperitif wine and pairs quite beautifully with vegetarian options, shrimp and burrata.

name: DR. KONSTANTIN FRANK, Riesling Semi Dry, New York, Finger Lakes, 2023
description: orange pith and lemon notes on the palate with a little touch of white raspberry and orange blossom...great acidity in this classic example of finger lakes riesling...dr. frank is a legend in the new york state wine industry.

name: DAOU, Sauvignon Blanc, California, Paso Robles, 2023
description: snappy and sunny...zippy and zesty, this bottle checks all the boxes for sauvie lovers...fresh lime zest, wet stone, grapefruit pith and notes of passionfruit...positively lip smacking. (92WE)

name: ROMBAUER, Sauvignon Blanc, California, Napa and Sonoma, 2023
description: absolutely fresh as a daisy..honeydew melon and passionfruit aromas abound as well...this is a wine at home with any shellfish, mollusk or freshwater fish preparation..this is the wine to sip with clams alla bianco, trust me. (92WS)

name: PAHLMEYER "JAYSON", Sauvignon Blanc, California, Napa Valley, 2023
description: tropical and stone fruits dance the tangy tango together...a refreshing squeeze of lemon zest and a dash of salinity makes this sauvie our new go-to summer white. (92WE)

name: DUMOL, Chenin Blanc, California, Sonoma Coast, 2023
description: i am an unabashed chenin blanc fanatic and you would be hard pressed to find one as spectacular as this one outside of the loire valley...aromas of asian pear, acacia honey and mineral, followed by a bright nectarine palate and a zesty grapefruit tinged finish...VERY little of this bottle is produced but i managed to nab a few..you are WELCOME...IT'S A UNICORN WINE.

name: ELK COVE, Pinot Gris, Oregon, Willamette Valley 2023
description: plump mouthfeel with orchard fruits, tangerine, asian pear and subtle notes of ginger on the palate...closes with peach and spice...how very delicious oregon pinot gris can be. (92WE/91WS)

name: SONOMA-CUTRER, Chardonnay, Russian River Ranches, California, Sonoma, 2023
description: great balance between zesty and creamy....a ripe and buttery palate but with ample salinity and bright tropical and citrus fruits to hold everything in perfect harmony...a zingy beam of lemon curd on the finish.

name: CROSSBARN BY PAUL HOBBS, Chardonnay, California, Sonoma Coast, 2023
description: a clean and refined cali chard with lifted aromas of freshly picked honey crisp apples, bosc pear and a hint of lemon zest...it is bright and silky on the palate with an elegant and ripe finish. (93JS/92WS)

name: ROMBAUER, Chardonnay, California, Carneros, 2023
description: this chard has loads of pet nicknames but my favorite one is...cougar juice...indeed, i ordered a glass of this once in kentucky and heard the bartender yell, "glass of cougar juice for table 1" and it still cracks me up...all joking aside, this is a rich and ripe style of chard, offering notes of ripe peach, apple and baking spice...ample and plush mouthfeel and a long finish (92WE)

name: RAMEY, Chardonnay, California, Russian River Valley, 2022
description: a rich and nuanced chard..opens with notes of apple and peach cobbler, david ramey is a chardonnay savant...cream and lemon curd..vibrant and balanced, ends with a flourish of vanilla, baking spices and cream. (95WE/94WS #10 on WS TOP 100 WINES)

name: DUMOL, Chardonnay, "Wester Reach", Sonoma, Russian River Valley 2022
description: one of the most powerful chardonnays you will ever have the sheer pleasure of sipping..full of peach blossom, toasted nuts, marzipan, nectarines...medium in body with explosive length on the finish..a superstar chard..and one that will pair beautifully with seafood. (95WE/95JD/94JS)

name: HARTFORD COURT, Chardonnay, "Four Hearts Vineyard", California, Russian River, 2021
description: classic russian river valley chardonnay..ripe pear, just slightly underripe peach skin, sugared grapefruit, notes of ginger spice and a whiff of honey..vibrant and juicy fruit on the finish..absolutely outstanding..love it. (94WA/93WE/94JD)

name: FLOWERS, Chardonnay, California, Sonoma Coast, 2023
description: if you ever want to buy me a bouquet of flowers? make it the liquid kind! i am a BIG flowers fan and this bottle is beautiful..it's a stunningly pure and vibrant chardonnay that is kissed by the sea air and smacks of coastal citrus and granny smith apple..medium body with a texture like buttercream..flipping fabulous. (96JD/94JS/93WS/92VM/TOP 100 WINE SPECTATOR)

name: STAGLIN FAMILY VINEYARDS, Chardonnay, "SALUS", California, Napa Valley, 2022
description: complex, elegant and refined which can be rather rare for a warm climate chardonnay...if you've ever smelled honeysuckle, you will certainly note that aroma right out of the gate...a brightness on the palate continues to intrigue with notes of lemon verbena, grilled peach and a hint of baked brioche...a long finish with a lovely texture and gentle kick of acidity.

name: SHAFER Vineyards, Chardonnay, Red Shoulder Ranch, California, Napa Valley, 2022
description: aromas of baked apple, hand melon and ripe pear..long and luscious finish, with notes of creme brûlée and pear compote..this bottle is like a ballerina, combining power and grace and beauty..a stunning chardonnay and long counted a favorite. (97WE/96JS/94WA)

name: CASTELLO DI BOSSI, Chianti Classico Riserva, "BERARDO", Italy, Tuscany, 2020/2021
description: CERTIFIED ORGANIC and an absolutely sublime riserva chianti...it is super sleek and expressive with notes of marasca cherry, blood orange, baking spice and hint of toasty vanilla...SUPERB! (97JS/92WA/90VM)

name: CASTELLO DI VERRAZZANO, Chianti Classico, Italy, Tuscany, 2021
description: certified organic and sustainable, castello di verrazzano has produced wine dating back to the etruscans..rich in flavors of blackberry and amarena cherry. (91JS/90WA)

name: CASTELLARE DI CASTELLINA, Chianti Classico, Toscana, 2023
description: purity of fruit and freshness on the palate...a laser beam of fresh sour cherry and forest fruit..a finish that lasts for minutes..a knockout in terms of quality for the price point (92VM/91JS)

name: TENUTA DI ARCENO, Chianti Classico Riserva, Italy, Tuscany, 2019
description: a rich and velvety texture with very expressive aromas of cedar, smoke and eucalyptus...flavors of bright red strawberry fruits and chocolate covered cherries...a long finish offering herbal notes and flamed orange zest...a beauty. (93WA/93JS/93JD/91WS)

name: LISINI, Brunello di Montalcino, Italy, Tuscany, 2020
description: an absolutely gorgeous brunello from the 2020 vintage...aromas and flavors of crushed stone, morello cherries and a whiff of perfumed violets...medium to full bodied with a seemingly endless finish...100% IN LOVE. (95DC/94WS/93+VM)

name: SIRO PACENTI, Brunello di Montalcino, Pelagrilli, Italy, Tuscany, 2020
description: a very concentrated expression of the sangiovese grape...aromas and flavors of poached and baked dark fruits with notes of grilled mediterranean herbs, a cavalcade of spices and a kiss of sweet smoke...full bodied, yet soft and luscious on the palate...outstanding. (96JS/94WA/94VM)

name: ALTESINO, Brunello di Montalcino, Italy, Tuscany, 2020
description: an absolute ROCK STAR brunello...a stunning bouquet, offering notes of strawberry, spice and rose potpourri...like a waltz, it is polished, smooth and refined...a long, long finish with a silk robe of tannins. (95WA/95JD/95JS/92VM)

name: SAN GIORGIO, Brunello di Montalcino "Ugolforte", Italy, Tuscany, 2020
description: certified organic...full-bodied yet retains a freshness with a slightly citrusy component which dances with the spicy cinnamon stick and ripe cherry elements...fully ripe tannins on display with a generous mouthfeel and long, spice focused finish. (94JS/93WA/93VM)

name: CAPARZO, Brunello di Montalcino, "Vigna La Casa", Italy, Tuscany, 2018
description: loads of sweet blue and black fruits with notes of savory spice and a bit of graphite...black cherries and crushed stones...full bodied with very ripe and tannins like a linebacker, finishing with a black cherry flourish kissed by cocoa nib. (96JS/95WS/94VM/93WA)

name: COL D'ORCIA, Brunello di Montalcino, Nastagio Riserva, Italy, Tuscany, 2018
description: exquisite and luxurious...acidity that is as bright as the north star with a cavalcade of aromas of ripe, dark black raspberry fruit. citrus, spice and mediterranean herbs...the finish lasts for minutes with flavors of figs, macerated strawberries and dark chocolate...GORGEOUS. (96JD/94WE/93JS/92VM)

name: PIAGGIA, Carmignano, "II Sasso", Italy, Tuscany, 2022
description: a blend of 70% sangiovese, along with cabernet sauvignon, as is typical of the region.....a super tuscan wine of extreme affordability...quite complex on the nose with aromas reminiscent of a walk in the woods on an autumn evening...notes of currants and blackberries beguile... (94VM)

name: TENUTA SETTE CIELE, Toscana "YANTRA", Italy, Tuscany, 2022
description: an aromatic blend of cabernet sauvignon and merlot...black cherries and grilled mediterranean herbs...medium to full bodied on the palate with a pleasantly fruit filled finish. (91JS)

name: AVIGNONESI, Toscana IGT Merlot, "Desiderio", Italy, Tuscany, 2020
description: my favorite merlot from italy...smooth and ripe with explosive aromatics of cherry, plum and black tea...organic, sustainable and biodynamic...finishes with silky tannins and noted of spice...an incredibly well structured tuscan merlot. (92VM)

name: AIA VECCHIA, Bolgheri Rosso Superiore, "Sor Ugo", Italy, Tuscany, 2020
description: a blend of cabernet sauvignon, merlot, cabernet franc and petit verdot, this is a beautiful baby super tuscan from the bolgheri region.. succulent and rich, with black cherry, baking spice and a touch of mint..finishes with verve and richness..it's just beautiful. (94VM)

name: LUIANO, Colorino, "LUI", Italy, Tuscany, 2022
description: a cavalcade of aromas including fresh cherry, rose blossom, espresso and a hint of white pepper...full-bodied and complex, finishing with a savory edge complemented by notes of bitter chocolate...a blend of cabernet sauvignon, colorino and merlot. (94WE)

name: ANTINORI, GUADO AL TASSO CONT'UGO, Toscana IGT, Italy, Tuscany, 2022
description: antinori is a centuries old family whose name is synonymous with the best of tuscany...this bottle is crafted entirely from merlot and features gobs of fruit and spice on the nose and palate...blackberries, amarena cherries, a kiss of oak...excellent weight and a long finish. (94WS)

name: MARCHESI ANTINORI, "Tignanello" IGT, Super Tuscan, 2021
description: this wine was one to put the super tuscan category on the worldwide vinous map..sangiovese with cabernet sauvignon and cabernet franc..ripe red fruits and licorice..cassis from the cabernet contribution..smooth and endlessly fascinating...we love our TIG around here and this vintage is one of the best ever. (98WA/98VM/97WS #3 WS TOP 100)

name: TENUTA DELL'ORNELLAIA, "Le Serre Nuove", Super Tuscan, 2022
description: this bottle is always such a joy to sip and this vintage is no exception..very plush with blackberry pie, black cherry and roasted plums..this is a luscious and slightly more modern interpretation, and it's a stunner..merlot, cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and petit verdot. (95JS/95WE/94WA/93WS)

name: TENUTA SAN GUIDO, SASSICAIA, Super Tuscan, Italy, Tuscany, 2020
description: the O.G. of the super tuscan category...predominantly cabernet sauvignon with the balance cabernet franc, this is a classic sassicaia...very perfumed on the nose with deep, dark black fruits, notes of grilled mediterranean herbs, pine and blackberry preserves...it is a dazzling bottle. (97JS/97WS/97DC/97VM/96WA)

name: PODERE ALDO CONTERNO, “QUARTETTO” Nebbiolo Blend, Italy, Piedmont, 2021
description: a very unique wine, as piedmont tends to lean toward singular varietals...this one is a blend of nebbiolo, pinot noir, merlot and syrah and is absolutely wonderful...i applaud this venerable winemaker for creating this completely unique yet thoroughly piemontese offering. (92WS)

name: AZELIA, Langhe Nebbiolo, Italy, Piedmont, 2022
description: literally baby barolo, as the grapes come from azelia's barolo vineyards...this nebbiolo displays such purity and brightness on the nose and palate..wild roses, so typical of the varietal, are there in spades and the finish is luminous..zesty acidity and fully ripe tannins on display. (91DC)

name: G.D. VAJRA, Barolo, "Albe", Italy, Piedmont, 2020
description: enticingly floral and extremely fragrant..notes of rose petals, indicative of the varietal, pure and extremely elegant with wild strawberry and herbal notes of eucalyptus and mint..incredibly balanced, sleek and sexy..built for bolo and beef. (#9 TOP 100 94WS/94WE/94WA/93JS)

name: FONTANAFREDDA, Barolo del Commune di Serralunga d'Alba, Italy, Piedmont, 2019
description: barolos from this region are characterized by great structure and power...rose scented cherry and licorice whip on the nose with fairly stiff tannins and a finish of spice, tar and black cherry. (93WS/91WE/91JS)

name: ELVIO COGNO, Barbaresco, Bordini, Italy, Piedmont, 2019
description: if a bowl full of ripe cherries married a bottle of the finest balsamic vinegar, their offspring may very well have the aroma of this bottle..it evolves in the glass, offering more earthy notes and subtle ginger and mocha tones..fine and persistent with a long and silky smooth finish. (96WE/94JS/93WA/93WS/93VM)

name: SERIO E BATISTA BORGOGNO, Barolo Cannubi "Truffle Hunters", Italy, Piedmont, 2018
description: a savory and spicy interpretation from one of the most celebrated cru sites in piedmont..super concentrated fruit with gobs of smoky cherry, mint, blood orange and earth...medium in body but loads of grippy tannins..an amazing, savory finish, lasting for minutes. (94DC/93WA/93VM)

name: MARZIANO ABBONA, Barolo Ravera DOCG, Italy, Piedmont, 2018
description: an intense garnet red and a study in the ravera cru...textbook rose petal, tar, and cherry eau de vie on the nose...finishes with opulence, intense tannins with a whiff of spice on the close...each abbona label features various species of birds found on the estate's vineyards.

name: LUIGI BAUDANA, Barolo, Cerretta, Italy, Piedmont, 2018
description: one of the most limited production in barolo and certified organic...winemaking is in the BEST hands, as the property is farmed by the venerable vajra family...it is firm and linear, taut and chiseled like a gymnast but with all the bells and whistles that you expect of a barolo of this caliber...great stuff. (95/W&S/94WA/93WS/92JS)

name: VIBERTI, Barbera d'Alba, "LA GEMELLA", Italy, Piedmont, 2022
description: a generous core of blackberry and boysenberry fruits...firmly structured, juicy and medium-bodied with a fresh finish that speaks of spiced cherries...delish. (TOP 100 WS/91WS/91JS)

name: MASCIARELLI, MARINA CVETIC, Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Riserva, Italy, Abruzzo, 2020
description: tremendous quality here from one of the most iconic producers in the abruzzo region..crushed blackberries, citrus preserves and darkest forest fruits..medium to full bodied with medium, mouth coating tannins and a rich and fruit filled finish. (93VM)

name: FEUDO MACCARI, Nero d'Avola, "SAIA", 2021
description: if there is a more delicious expression of this grape, we have yet to find it...perhaps the perfect pizza wine, this wine is gorgeous in its rusticity..we count it as one of our favorite nero d'avolas. (90VM)

name: ANTINORI TENUTE BOCCA DI LUPO, Aglianico DOC Castel del Monte, Italy, Puglia, 2020
description: from the famed antinori family holdings in puglia...it is everything a great aglianico should be...notes of menthol and wild herbs, crushed blueberries and notes of campfire...intense, complex and full bodied, finishing with a flourish of blackberry compote, licorice and spice...grippy tannins make this a wine for the heartiest of fare. (94VM/93WS)

name: BENANTI, Etna Rosso Nerello Mascalese Contrada Calderara Sottana, Italy, Sicily, 2022
description: a complex etna rosso with a medium to full body...the fruit for this wine comes from the north side of mt. etna and, as such, offers plenty of aromatics such as crushed stone, minerals, darkest red and black fruits with notes of blood orange and herbs arriving on the finish...polished, taut and spice driven. (94WA/94JS/94VM/93WS)

name: FEUDO MONTONI, Nero d'Avola, "VRUCARA", Prephylloxera, Italy, Sicily, 2018
description: the top wine of this storied estate, certified organic and filled with notes of balsamic, tobacco leaf, eucalyptus and a touch of licorice whip...texturally gorgeous with a finish that lasts as long as it takes you to beg for another sip. (93WA)

name: ABBAZIA DI NOVACELLA, Pinot Nero, Italy, Süditrol-Alto Adige, 2023
description: practicing organic farming, this is one of the most prestigious wineries in the area...this is a pretty and graceful wine with a nose full of rose petals, fresh strawberries and cherry...it is light on its feet and bright as a star and finishes with light and slightly chalky tannins...it is stunning. (91JS)

name: TOMMASI, Amarone della Valpolicella Classico, Italy, Veneto, 2020
description: rich and luscious..notes of dried figs and plums..blackberries and cocoa..a little hint of espresso bean..medium to full bodied..if ever there was a wine that one could describe as opulent, this would be it..one of the preeminent producers in the veneto. (93JS/92VM/91WS/91WA)

name: ZENATO, Amarone della Valpolicella Classico, Italy, Veneto, 2019
description: this is a stunningly delicious amarone and one of my new favorite finds...if you can imagine the richest of cherries, clothed in a velvet smoking jacket of finest chocolate and kissed by a spice box, you can almost taste this wine before even putting it to your lips...rich and generous with one of the longest finishes i have tasted in an amarone...it's superb stuff. (95WS/93JS)

name: CESARI, Amarone della Valpolicella Classico, Italy, Veneto, 2019
description: big red..and, in fact this bottle may remind you of just that..loaded with cinnamon spice, super ripe dark forest fruits..in fact, it evokes sensory images of a stroll in a deep, dark forest..medium to full bodied with all that sumptuous fruit that is amarone's calling card. (91WE)

name: ALLEGRINI, Amarone della Valpolicella Classico, Italy, Veneto, 2019
description: ripe, smooth and concentrated.. loads of plum and spice aromas with a licorice and black cherry core that is impossible to resist..full bodied, lush and round with a mineral driven finish, featuring dark cocoa nib and fig...powerful and awesome. (95WE/95VM/94JS/92WS)

name: MASI, Amarone della Valpolicella, Costasera Riserva, Italy, Veneto, 2019
description: long revered as pioneers in the industry, the masi name is basically synonymous with amarone...aromas of fig and wild blueberry on the nose...it is both savory and filled with unctuous fruit flavors...chewy tannins and a lovely herbal note on the close.(94WE/93WS)

name: ZEPHYR WELLS, Pinot Noir, "La Carbonique", Oregon, Willamette Valley, 2024
description: it is very rare that i taste a pinot noir that is so delightfully different than any other that i have tasted but this one is it...it has an astonishing nose filled with bright cherry lifesaver and cola...notes of cranberry and cinnamon stick will have you dreaming of your holiday table...tart and savory at once with a juicy mouthfeel and an ideal match for food...a favorite new find!

name: ERNEST CELLARS, Pinot Noir, Sonoma Coast, 2023
description: this is a stunning vino and a stunning value...smooth as silk...resplendent with cherry, ripe raspberry and freshly cut herbs from the garden positively glow in this wine...balanced on a fine high wire of tension and acidity....it's just gorgeous. (94WE/93JS/93JD/92VM)

name: ELK COVE, Pinot Noir "La Bohème", Oregon, Willamette Valley, Yamhill-Carlton, 2022
description: quite fragrant on the nose, offering copious aromas of rose petal, red raspberry and forest floor...warm baking spices add to the fleshy finish...light to medium bodied with refined tannins and a long, rose perfumed finish. (94WS/92WA)

name: SEAN MINOR THE INVITED SERIES, Pinot Noir, Sangiacamo Roberts Road, California, Sonoma Coast, 2023
description: what a fabulous pinot for your holiday table...nuances of fresh cranberry, wild blueberries and slightly scorched earth...delicate and perfectly balanced. (94TP/91WE)

name: KISTLER, Pinot Noir, California, Russian River Valley, 2023
description: if grace kelly were a bottle of wine, this would be the wine...feminine, elegant and the epitome of graceful...only free run juice is used to preserve that beautiful, pale raspberry hue...you might not be able to pry it out of my hands...but, you should definitely TRY.

name: PENNER-ASH, Pinot Noir, Oregon, Willamette Valley, 2022
description: fresh and lively expression of pinot noir from venerable winemaker lynn penner-ash..alive with red cherries, a bit of tart cranberry and red raspberry seed..earthy accents add complexity and the finish is silken with juicy tannins. (94WS)

name: ANTIQUUM FARM, Pinot Noir, Oregon, Willamette Valley, 2022
description: organic and sustainable and the very definition of elegant...sourced from the very highest elevations leading to a stunning and ethereal pinot noir...gorgeous floral notes coupled with bright cherry fruit and crushed rock...a new discovery for me and a thrilling one.

name: BIG TABLE FARM, Pinot Noir, Oregon, Willamette Valley, 2023
description: checks every box from a willamette valley pinot noir...bright fruit, notes of savory spice and notes of raspberry rooibos tea...it is unfined and unfiltered, allowing the true nature of the grape to shine through...the portly porcines pictured on the label are part of the farm's residents and are named laverne and shirley! "Schlemiel! Schlimazel! Hasenpfeffer Incorporated!" (93JS/93WS)

name: KEN WRIGHT, Pinot Noir, Guadalupe Vineyard, Oregon, Willamette Valley, 2021
description: expressive and graceful, with notes of pure raspberry and field flowers..elegant finish that is kissed with a touch of spice..there is an underlying note of smoke and spice that is just captivating..beautiful blue toned fruits round out the gorgeous finish. (92WE)

name: DUMOL, Pinot Noir, Macintyre Estate Vineyard, California, Sonoma Coast, 2022
description: tasted recently at a dumol luncheon, this was a standout for me...floral and feminine with raspberry seed bergamot and bright red fruits...it is just what pinot should be...precise, focused and energetic, finishing with a flourish of woodland herbs and gorgeous acidity. (97JS/94WA)

name: PETER MICHAEL, Pinot Noir, "Le Caprice", California, Sonoma, Fort Ross-Seaview, 2019
description: i'm often asked what my favorite pinot noir is..sort of like asking which is my favorite thoroughbred..but this may just be THE ONE..impossibly fragrant with wild raspberry, violet, rose petal, kirsch...a mouthfeel like the finest silk..medium to full bodied with a finish that lasts for minutes..an amazing bottle from a true legend. (96-97WA/97JS)

name: DAOU, The Bodyguard Red Blend, California, Paso Robles, 2021
description: this is a rich, tooth staining red in the best way...aromas of charred walnuts, cassis, chocolate covered cherries and red plums...a savory palate with spice and a note of espresso bean...a blend of petit verdot and petite sirah. (93WE)

name: SEGHESIO FAMILY VINEYARDS, Zinfandel, "Angela's Table", California, Sonoma, 2023
description: this bottle is just an absolute treat...loads of blackberry, plum, and black raspberry compote with vanilla scented spice...bold, rich and unabashedly zinful.

name: ROBERT BIALE, Zinfandel "Black Chicken", California, Napa Valley, 2023
description: this is my very favorite napa valley zin...spiced sugarplums, black cherries and savory grilled herbs are all present on the nose and palate...medium to full bodied with a generous core of fruit and persistent acidity to keep it fresh and fun. (94WE/93JS/93WS/92WA)

name: ROMBAUER, Zinfandel, California, 2022
description: smooth, luscious and pure california in spirit and spunk..loaded with notes of vanilla, christmas baking spices, plums and ripe raspberries..finishing with a flourish of dark cocoa, soft tannins and a creamy, lip smacking finish..delicious. (91WE/90JD)

name: BUENA VISTA WINERY, "THE SHERIFF"
description: Red Blend, California, Sonoma, 2022 • founded in 1857, buena vista winery produces a wide range of world class wines...this wine pays homage to founder, agoston haraszthy, one of california's first elected sheriffs...it is a bold and big blend of petite sirah, cabernet sauvignon, syrah and grenache and features opulent red and black fruits on the nose and palate...medium to full bodied and finishes with dark cocoa nib and a big bowlful of fruit....there's a new sheriff in town and he means business.

name: K VINTNERS, Syrah, "MOTOR CITY KITTY"
description: Washington State, Columbia Valley, 2020 • serious and intense syrah from a master of this grape in washington...aromas of chocolate, blackberry, amarena cherry and spice...full bodied and firm. (98JS/95+WA/96VM)

name: ORIN SWIFT, 8 Years In The Desert
description: Red Blend, California, 2022 • can you ever be too rich? this bottle begs the question...your senses will absolutely delight in the rich blackberry and wild blueberry fruits...rich, rich, round tannins and a finish kissed by cocoa and spice...for fans of GOBSMACKING zinfandel based blends, this one's for you.

name: ORIN SWIFT, "Abstract"
description: Red Blend, California, St. Helena, 2022 • if you don't think that wine can have umami character...taste this and have your mind changed...a bland of grenache, syrah and petite sirah, it oozes aromas of blackberry, plum, black pepper and forest floor, finishing with a flourish of balsamic and sweet oak notes. (91WS)

name: ORIN SWIFT, "You Had Me at Hell No"
description: Advice from John, Merlot, California, 2023 • leave it to orin swift to craft a merlot that we ALL love...aromatics of freshly baked blackberry pie and dark plum with a beautiful floral lift...savory notes on the palate and a long finish that speaks of espresso bean and blackberry patch.

name: ORIN SWIFT, Proprietary Red, "Papillon"
description: California, Napa Valley, 2022 • an homage to the famed left bank blends of bordeaux..cabernet sauvignon based with all 5 traditional varietals in play..powerful and seductive aromas of graphite, cassis..uber ripe dark fruits envelop your palate with a flourish..a hint of mint on the finish. (94WA)

name: BLUE ROCK VINEYARDS, Baby Blue
description: Red Blend, California, Sonoma, 2021 • i am often asked what we sip at home...you know, just on a let's grill some burgers kind of evening...this is often the answer to that question...primarily cabernet sauvignon but pays homage to bordeaux incorporating all 5 classic bordeaux varietals in the blend...it just checks all the boxes and we hope you love it as much as we do. (92WE/90JS)

name: POSTMARK BY DUCKHORN, Cabernet Sauvignon
description: California, Paso Robles, 2022 • paso robles cabs have legions of fans...this example is proof positive of the allure of paso...rich and generous with a palate full of boysenberry, plum and black raspberry jam...a touch of vanilla scented spice on the finish adds to the appeal of this voluptuous vamp. (93JS)

name: TREFETHEN FAMILY, ESCHOL
description: Estate Red, California, Napa, Oak Knoll District, 2022 • a stunning and fitting homage to bordeaux, incorporating all 5 traditional varietals...bold and fruit forward on approach with black fruits and dark cherries...medium to full bodied and fresh during flight...seamless and ripe tannins with balanced acidity on the landing. (cool label too!)

name: BARNETT, Cabernet Sauvignon, California, Napa, Spring Mountain, Rattlesnake Vyd., 2022
description: perched above st. helena lies the idyllic spring mountain district, my favorite appellation for napa cabernet, as the combination of altitude and terroir creates magical wines...ripe, rich and concentrated, this wine has every textbook descriptor in spades, finishes with polished tannins and a mouth full of dark cocoa and black cherry. (96WA)

name: LA JOTA, Cabernet Sauvignon, California, Napa Valley, Howell Mountain, 2018
description: an absolute stunner..the la jota cab is a perennial favorite bottle..loads of cassis, black cherry, plum and savory notes of underbrush and herbs on the nose..full bodied and full throttle on the palate, with a finish that seems to have no end..one of the best of the vintage,.splurge-worthy. (97WA/94WE/96JS/94WS)

name: DRY CREEK VINEYARD, Meritage "The Mariner", California, Sonoma, Dry Creek Valley, 2021
description: a true meritage wine, paying homage to all 5 traditional bordeaux varietals...cabernet sauvignon is dominant with merlot, petit verdot, cabernet franc and malbec playing supporting roles in the blend...full bodied with notes of tobacco, leather and black currant...firm tannins and fresh acidity...organic and sustainable. (91JD)

name: TREFETHEN FAMILY, "DRAGON'S TOOTH", California, Napa Valley, Oak Knoll, 2021
description: a blend of primarily malbec with splashes of petit verdot and cabernet sauvignon..ripe aromas and flavors of black cherry, blackberry, mocha, sassafras and fig..medium to full bodied and a long and luxurious finish..outstanding. (97DC/93JS/90WS)

name: SHAFER, Cabernet Sauvignon Hillside Select, California, Napa Valley, Stags Leap, 2018
description: a rare opportunity to spoil yourself with a pedigreed bottle that is very limited in availability...one of the best expressions of cabernet sauvignon in the world today...full bodied with notes of crème de cassis, blackberries, pencil shavings and black cherry...finishing with an energy and focus that is irresistible and some may say perfection. (100JD/99JS/98WA/98VM/95WS)

name: TREFETHEN FAMILY, "HALO", Cabernet Sauvignon, California, Napa Valley, 2018
description: a wine most rare, this is the most beloved and limited of all the trefethen offerings...aromas of ripest raspberry with alluring notes of pepper, baking spices, plum and tobacco...finishes with a flourish of mature and well integrated tannins and is a powerhouse bottle and a force to be reckoned with...if you feel the same, this is the bottle to beguile yourself with. (95CG)

name: SPRING VALLEY VINEYARDS, Cabernet Sauvignon, "DERBY", Washington State, Walla Walla Valley, 2019
description: 100% cabernet sauvignon and 100% estate grown fruit...vibrant and refined on the palate with layers upon layers of black cherry, dark plum and a box of warm spices...finishes with notes of balsam and blackberry preserves. (92WS)

name: SPOTTSWOODE, Cabernet Sauvignon, California, Napa Valley, St. Helena, 2014
description: like a thoroughbred, this wine has a power that is also graceful, elegant and equipped with legs to run ALL DAY..crushed rocks, winter potpourri, red currants, dried plums, very firm tannins and a persistent acidity. (98WA/98WE/96JS)

name: HEDGES FAMILY ESTATE, Cabernet Sauvignon, Washington State, Red Mountain, 2021
description: demeter certified biodynamically grown grapes and sourced from 100% estate fruit...ripest red cherry, mocha and vanilla-tinged blackberry on the nose..full, sexy and lush and from one of the best producers in washington..finishes with a flourish of cassis, flamed orange zest and cocoa..we are huge fans of washington state cabs and this is one of our faves. (92JS/93JD)

name: POST PARADE, Cabernet Sauvignon, "Stretch Drive", California, Napa Valley, 2018
description: this limited bottling is not only spectacular to sip, it's also got a name that we just couldn't resist..this is a bright and boisterous bottle, much like many of our favorite thoroughbreds..ripe, red berry fruits with notes of baking spice and a floral lift..it's a wine worthy of the winner's circle. (93WS/93JD/92VM)
